text: John H. Morehead was an American Democratic Party politician who served as governor of Nebraska from 1913 to 1917. During his tenure several labor laws were introducedTitle: Labor Legislation of 1915 : Bulletin of the United States Bureau of Labor Statistics, No. 186, P.227-233 while a law was passed in 1915 providing for cash benefits to be provided for certain women in need.Title: Labor Legislation of 1915 : Bulletin of the United States Bureau of Labor Statistics, No. 186, P.229-230 ==References== Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians Category:Governors of Nebraska
title: John H. Morehead
